name: DOT Full game
description: i found this game at a gardge sale it looked fun so i braught it for 1 dollar it was in a small disk. written on the case red the date 1995. when i played it was the most rage induceing game that ive ever played and while playing it for only 20 mins i was going insane. this game was a little glitchy due to the game to never be released so beware
